name: taskmanager
description: A comprehensive task management application built with React, Azure Functions, and SQL Server

scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:client
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:api
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:api && npm run test:integration:client
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:client && npm run test:coverage:api
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:api
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:client && npm run lint:fix:api
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:client && npm run clean:api
scripts.clean:client: cd client && rm -rf node_modules dist coverage
scripts.clean:api: cd api && rm -rf node_modules dist coverage
scripts.setup: npm run setup:db && npm run install:all
scripts.setup:db: echo 'Please run the SQL scripts in the sql/ directory to setup the database'
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:api && npm run deploy:client
